Blaze destroys four Scituate homes; strikes Milton house

(Jessica Bartlett for the Globe)

A fire whipped by winds blowing up to 50 miles per hour damaged four beachfront homes in Scituate, while a fire also struck a Milton home. (Globe, 6:03 p.m.)

Boston temps march to a new record

The temperature hit 68 degrees, beating the 1995 record. Winds also blew across the area at 45 to 50 miles per hour. (Globe, 2:44 p.m.)
